content.rendered:
• This requirement is valid till 13-02-2022
  • Required Skills: Desktop support
  • Location: Mumbai
  • Domain: Engineering Automobile & Manufacturing
  • Qualification: Any Degree
  • Experience: 2-4 yrs.
  • Job Description with Roles & Responsibilities: Troubleshoot and resolve desktop incidents. Manage disk and folder sharing, and permission settings on desktops. Handle printer problems at users desktops. Provide support to voice equipment including support for Lupin. VOIP voice devices such as plugging in the headsets and carrying out headset settings. Assist users in accessing applications
  • Skillset: Desktop Support Engineer
